sentences.en: As soon as she realized she had a particular shortcoming, she resolutely overcame it.
sentences.cn: 她一发现自己的毛病, 就坚决改正.

sentences.en: Eleanor took up her book resolutely.
sentences.cn: 爱莉娜坚定地拿起书来.

sentences.en: He grumbles at his lot instead of resolutely facing his difficulties.
sentences.cn: 他不是果敢地去面对困难,而是抱怨自己运气不佳.

sentences.en: He resolutely adhered to what he had said at the meeting.
sentences.cn: 他坚持他在会上所说的话.
他坚决不接受他们的贿赂.

sentences.en: He resolutely refused to speak English unless forced to.
sentences.cn: 除非迫不得已，否则他坚决不说英语。

sentences.en: He resolutely went back to the front.
sentences.cn: 他毅然决然地重返前线.

sentences.en: In my opinion, Roscoe and his churchmen are marching resolutely backwards.
sentences.cn: 依我看, 罗斯科同他那些教会伙伴是在开倒车.

sentences.en: Mr Clarke has shown himself to be resolutely opposed to compromise.
sentences.cn: 克拉克先生已表示自己坚决反对妥协。

sentences.en: Pressed beyond the limits of forbearance, our army fought back resolutely and dealt telling blows to the enemy.
sentences.cn: 我军忍无可忍,奋起反击, 给了敌人沉重的打击.

sentences.en: She struggled so resolutely against the oppression of her feelings.
sentences.cn: 她非常坚决地与自己精神上的极大痛苦作了斗争.

sentences.en: The international community should work hard to strengthen cooperation and resolutely fight all forms of terrorism.
sentences.cn: 国际社会必须继续努力，加强合作，坚决打击一切形式的恐怖主义。

sentences.en: The order is very strict and must be carried out resolutely.
We will resolutely perform our internationalist duty no matter what happens.
sentences.cn: 不管发生什么情况,我们都要坚决履行我们的国际主义义务.

sentences.en: Xiao Li more resolutely oppose this opinion than others to it.
sentences.cn: 小李比其他人更坚决地反对这意见.

words.tran_cn: [物] 分辨率；决议；解决；决心
决定；溶解；使…分解；决心要做…
